CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
CurrentVersion.description: Search in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows will now return content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
OldVersion.description: Search in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows will now return content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
OldVersion.description: This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Graph Grounded Chat
OldVersion.description: Ask Copilot for answers grounded in your work content from the Microsoft Graph—your chats, documents, meetings, and emails—beyond your active Excel workbook. If you’re analyzing a workbook and want to enhance your understanding using information from another source in your tenant, just ask Copilot in Excel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: New usage reports for Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection
CurrentVersion.description: The new report for Copilot (enterprise data protection) will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users of per app. The report will initially be limited to Copilot usage in the Microsoft 365 App and Microsoft Edge by users with a Microsoft 365 license. In the future, the report will include more apps. Admins can view usage insights as totals and can view trends for the last 7, 30, 90, or 180 days. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection
OldVersion.description: A new product usage report will be added in the Microsoft 365 admin center, providing insights into active usage of Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection. The report will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users per platform (e.g. Microsoft 365 App and Edge). Usage insights can be viewed as totals and trends for the past 7, 30, 90, or 180-day periods. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated teams and channels onboarding flow
CurrentVersion.description: When added to a new team, users can see which channels the team owner recommended, and select to show only the channels that are relevant to them.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated teams and channels onboarding flow
OldVersion.description: When added to a new team, users can see which channels the team owner recommended, and select to show only the channels that are relevant to them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
CurrentVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
OldVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
CurrentVersion.description: Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
OldVersion.description: Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to search for answers from the web
CurrentVersion.description: Use Copilot in Excel to search for answers from the web and add it to your Excel workbook.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Copilot to search for answers from the web
OldVersion.description: Use Copilot in Excel to search for answers from the web and add it to your Excel workbook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse series for continuous feedback supporting AI transformations and change management
CurrentVersion.description: New Pulse series templates are being introduced that are tailored to supporting continuous feedback scenarios for high value use cases such as change management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse series for continuous feedback supporting AI transformations and change management
OldVersion.description: New Pulse series templates are being introduced that are tailored to supporting continuous feedback scenarios for high value use cases such as change management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for non-touch phones
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access frequently dialed contacts and numbers with the ability to set up custom contacts and speed dial on the line key buttons and sidecars for non-touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. This feature will enable one-touch dialing capabilities and easy management of contact lists on line keys and sidecars.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for non-touch phones
OldVersion.description: Quickly access frequently dialed contacts and numbers with the ability to set up custom contacts and speed dial on the line key buttons and sidecars for non-touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. This feature will enable one-touch dialing capabilities and easy management of contact lists on line keys and sidecars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Microsoft Teams chat and channels experience
CurrentVersion.description: The new, streamlined chat and channels experience makes it easier to stay on top of what matters most and organize your digital workspace. Catch up on chat, channels and teams in one place, create custom sections to organize conversations by topics, use filters to triage messages and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Microsoft Teams chat and channels experience
OldVersion.description: The new, streamlined chat and channels experience makes it easier to stay on top of what matters most and organize your digital workspace. Catch up on chat, channels and teams in one place, create custom sections to organize conversations by topics, use filters to triage messages and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users can opt-in to try the new calendar in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: The new calendar in Teams combines rich productivity features and the latest innovations, like Microsoft Copilot and Microsoft Places, to help users collaborate seamlessly from anywhere. The new calendar in Teams is designed to be familiar and reliable, as it’s one unified calendar that works across new Outlook for Windows, Outlook on the web, Microsoft Places, and now Microsoft Teams. With this update, users will see the "New calendar" toggle at the top right of the calendar app in Teams. New calendar is off by default, and users can toggle to try the new experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users can opt-in to try the new calendar in Teams
OldVersion.description: The new calendar in Teams combines rich productivity features and the latest innovations, like Microsoft Copilot and Microsoft Places, to help users collaborate seamlessly from anywhere. The new calendar in Teams is designed to be familiar and reliable, as it’s one unified calendar that works across new Outlook for Windows, Outlook on the web, Microsoft Places, and now Microsoft Teams. With this update, users will see the "New calendar" toggle at the top right of the calendar app in Teams. New calendar is off by default, and users can toggle to try the new experience.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot agents in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users can create a Copilot agent in SharePoint simply by selecting the SharePoint sites and/or files. Share these Copilot agents with your team to use in SharePoint and/or Teams.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot agents in SharePoint
OldVersion.description: SharePoint users can create a Copilot agent in SharePoint simply by selecting the SharePoint sites and/or files. Share these Copilot agents with your team to use in SharePoint and/or Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on only specific email components like email body or attachments. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
OldVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on only specific email components like email body or attachments. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New Insider Risk Management Reporting Capabilities
CurrentVersion.description: Insider risk management is introducing one central location for all reports including analytics and user activity reports. Additional reports will also be available that will summarize trends in alerts generated and cases created. Sample reports include alerts generated over time, alerts actioned over time, alerts and cases generated by region and department, top triggering events of alerts generated, and average time to triage alerts and cases. The ability to filter reports will also be introduced. Users with the admin, analyst or investigator role will have access to view the new Alerts & cases report. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New Insider Risk Management Reporting Capabilities
OldVersion.description: Insider risk management is introducing one central location for all reports including analytics and user activity reports. Additional reports will also be available that will summarize trends in alerts generated and cases created. Sample reports include alerts generated over time, alerts actioned over time, alerts and cases generated by region and department, top triggering events of alerts generated, and average time to triage alerts and cases. The ability to filter reports will also be introduced. Users with the admin, analyst or investigator role will have access to view the new Alerts & cases report. Permissions for accessing analytics and user activity reports have not changed. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize who receives shift request notifications
CurrentVersion.description: To streamline your workflow and reduce notifications, we've enhanced our notification system so that shift request alerts are now exclusively sent to schedule group owners, and not all owners of a team. This targeted approach ensures that the right people receive the necessary updates, helping team owners maintain focus.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize who receives shift request notifications
OldVersion.description: To streamline your workflow and reduce notifications, we've enhanced our notification system so that shift request alerts are now exclusively sent to schedule group owners, and not all owners of a team. This targeted approach ensures that the right people receive the necessary updates, helping team owners maintain focus.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio support for screen sharing in immersive events
CurrentVersion.description: We're adding audio support for screen sharing in Microsoft Mesh. Presenters will now be able to choose whether they'd like to include system audio when starting a screen share in a Mesh event. This feature is available for presenters in Mesh with a Teams Premium license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio support for screen sharing in immersive events
OldVersion.description: We're adding audio support for screen sharing in Microsoft Mesh. Presenters will now be able to choose whether they'd like to include system audio when starting a screen share in a Mesh event. This feature is available for presenters in Mesh with a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town hall concurrent attendee increase to 50,000
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers of town hall instances can now reach wider audiences in a single event with an expansion to a maximum of 50,000 simultaneous attendees. This increase serves as a significant jump from the previous attendee cap of 20,000 for organizers with a Teams Premium license. The quality and stability of town halls up to this new limit will remain constant, providing high-quality and reliable content to participants. For events with more than 20,000 concurrent attendees, some interactivity features are disabled for all attendees. Organizations can get support for audiences up to 50,000 concurrent attendees by reaching out to the Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program (LEAP) for assistance (Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program – Microsoft Adoption). This feature is available for town hall organizers that have an active Teams Premium license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town hall concurrent attendee increase to 50,000
OldVersion.description: Organizers of town hall instances can now reach wider audiences in a single event with an expansion to a maximum of 50,000 simultaneous attendees. This increase serves as a significant jump from the previous attendee cap of 20,000 for organizers with a Teams Premium license. The quality and stability of town halls up to this new limit will remain constant, providing high-quality and reliable content to participants. For events with more than 20,000 concurrent attendees, some interactivity features are disabled for all attendees. Organizations can get support for audiences up to 50,000 concurrent attendees by reaching out to the Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program (LEAP) for assistance (Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program – Microsoft Adoption). This feature is available for town hall organizers that have an active Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location. A feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant will now be available for customers in GCC. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails for GCC
OldVersion.description: Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location. A feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant will now be available for customers in GCC. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Feature usage data sync
CurrentVersion.description: Edge Sync, which enables users to synchronize their Edge user data across multiple devices, is now launching a new sync data category called Feature Usage. This new category will allow users to synchronize data regarding their utilization of Edge features across all their devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Schedule messages in channels
CurrentVersion.description: Like in chat, you can now schedule send messages in channels. You can optimize the timing of your messages based on the recipient's work hours, out-of-office time, etc, and ensuring your messages are delivered at the most suitable time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365:  The new look of Excel, PowerPoint, and Word Web
CurrentVersion.description: Excel, PowerPoint, and Word web have a refreshed look that provides a simpler, more coherent experience that lets you focus more easily on your work.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365:  The new look of Excel, PowerPoint, and Word Web
OldVersion.description:

easily on your work.
